blogPost.excerpt: ✨ It's a minimal calendar for 2021 ✨ You'll get 24 PDF files (white & black version) to print and hang on your office's wall.
blogPost.body: ✨ It's a minimal calendar for 2021 ✨ You'll get 24 PDF files (white & black version) to print and hang on your office's wall.
blogPost.title: Minimal Calendar For 2021 - Dark & light, printable calendars for minimal offices
blogPost.author: Jim Raptis

localize.description: ✨这是2021年的最小日历，你将有24个✨文件(黑白版本)打印出来，并挂在办公室的墙上。

next.title:
The unbundling of ideas from the mental latticework of first principles leads to a network effect inside of a flywheel to operate in a decentralized cloud of scalable profits. 

Total addressable market is infinity.

localize.full_text:
从第一原理的精神格局中解开思想束缚，导致飞轮内部的网络效应，以分散的云端可扩展的利润运作。

总的可寻址市场是无穷大的。

從第一原理的精神格局中解開思想束縛，導致飛輪內部的網絡效應，以分散的雲端可擴展的利潤運作。

總的可尋址市場是無窮大的。
